    public class MapsActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
implements com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.InfoWindowAdapter, com.google.android.gms.maps.OnMapReadyCallback, com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnMarkerClickListener, com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnInfoWindowClickListener, IAsyncResponse<Location>
    Maps Activity with google API
